#BlackMagicCraft #Episode125

In this episode I sculpt an original 28mm scale door using green stuff which I then use as a master to create a silicon mold using Smooth-On OOMOO25. I then create multiple resin castings using Smooth-Cast 320

PURCHASE ITEMS USED IN THIS PROJECT
